meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of Kazakhstan.
meanings.sent1: In Kazakhstan, you can buy many things with just a few tenges.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for tenges at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The vending machine only accepted tenges, so I had to find a different one.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worth more than a thousand tenges.
meanings.sent5: The sound of coins clinking together filled the air as he counted his tenges.

meanings.sent1: I have five tenges in my wallet.
meanings.sent2: The shopkeeper handed me a handful of tenges as change.
meanings.sent3: The tenges in my pocket jingled as I walked down the street.
meanings.sent4: The tenges scattered on the floor like shiny confetti.
meanings.sent5: She saved up all her tenges to buy a special gift for her mom.
